title: With freebies, OpenAI, Google vie for Indian users and training data
description: OpenAI, Google and Perplexity have begun an unprecedented fight for artificial intelligence users in India
content:
OpenAI, Google and Perplexity have begun an unprecedented fight for artificial intelligence users in India, rolling out freebies in a strategy seen as a way to harvest troves of multilingual training data in the world’s most populous nation.

title: Coursera To Combine With Udemy In $2.5 Billion All-Stock Deal
description: As artificial intelligence compresses skill cycles and forces workers to reskill faster than ever, Coursera on December 17, has said it will combine with rival Udemy in an all-stock transaction, creating one of the world’s largest digital learning companies. The deal values the combined company at an implied equity value of about $2.5 billion, based on the closing prices of both stocks on December 16.

title: AI analysis of chest X-rays may reveal early signs of aging
description: Artificial intelligence may be able to reveal how fast your body is aging by analyzing a chest X-ray, according to a new study published in The Journals of Gerontology. Researchers found that a deep learning model was able to detect subtle, age-related changes in the heart, lungs, and overall health more effectively than leading DNA-based "epigenetic clocks."

title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a flat start; US, Asian markets fall
description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's main indexes closed lower on Wednesday, with the S&P 500 and the tech-heavy Nasdaq sinking to three-week lows as nagging worries about the artificial intelligence trade weighed on technology stocks. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 228.29 points, or 0.47%, to 47,885.97. The S&P 500 lost 78.83 points, or 1.16%, to 6,721.43. The Nasdaq Composite lost 418.14 points, or 1.81%, to 22,693.32.
content:

title: Technology exec says AI fuels blue-collar productivity boom, not job losses
description: Palantir chief technology officer Shyam Sankar says artificial intelligence technology is creating a blue-collar productivity boom, helping ICU nurses and factory workers.
content: Palantir chief technology officer Shyam Sankar told FOX Business that artificial intelligence (AI) is fueling a blue-collar productivity boom – not mass unemployment as forecast by Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt. – and said AI is accelerating hiring, trai... [4465 chars]

description: Despite the recent pullback in artificial intelligence stocks, the Bank of America thinks "the AI trade may still have room to run into 2026."
content:

title: US views India as "Highly Strategic Partner" for AI and Supply Chain security, American official says
description: The United States regards India as a crucial potential partner in efforts to secure global supply chains for artificial intelligence and semiconductors, a senior American official has said, whilst dismissing suggestions that political tensions prevented India's participation in a recent Washington summit.
